'''Turning Point''' is a [[Quest Domain]] encountered during {{Quest|Turning Point}}. In this domain, players complete a time trial challenge to help in the fight against [[Osial]], Overlord of the Vortex.

If the challenge fails, the player will have to talk to [[Bu'yun]] to reenter the domain.

==Adeptal Energies==
When the countdown is at set intervals, the player will gain adeptal energies throughout the fight. At 4:15, each attack will launch intermittent shockwaves that deal {{color|True DMG}}. At 3:25, the character will replenish HP per second. At 3:05, movement speed is greatly increased. At 2:30, all three adeptal energies will provide buffs to the player.
